projects: [{"title":"Solana Roads : Supercharging ðŸ”¥ Creator Communities","start_date":"Sep 2021","end_date":"Present","description":"Led a team of 3 to win Solana blockchain's biggest hackathon in India - Building out Loud in the Republic Category. Built an MVP for content creators to instantly fabricate their creator coins and market it within their communities."},{"title":"Analysis of vegetation for categorizing farmland (R, Shiny)","description":"Wrote R scripts for automated mapping of trees/plantation and farmland from 5m(spatial resolution) multispectral multi-temporal (LISS IV) satellite images. The script compares vegetation across different times to classify the pixels in the image that follow a crop rotation pattern to identify farming areas."},{"title":"Clustering of Urban, Forest and Water Bodies (Javascript, Python, Google Earth Engine)","description":"Used Javascript to retrieve satellite images from Google Earth Engine and also used different clustering algorithms on it to classify land in urban, forest or water bodies. Wrote python script to retrieve the NDVI values from the satellite images and analyse the vegetation growth over a region by generating time series of the NDVI data."},{"title":"Process Scheduling Simulator (Java, JavaFX)","description":"Created a fully functional process scheduling simulator desktop application with options for custom or randomly generated input. The simulator speed can be controlled and it displays the job table, ready queue as well as the Gantt chart for the ongoing jobs. Different scheduling algorithms like First Come First Serve (FCFS), Round Robin (RR), Shortest Job First (SJF), Shortest Remaining Time First (SRTF) and Priority Pre-emptive(PP)/Priority Non Pre-emptive(PNP) have been implemented."},{"title":"Service Recommender for E-commerce purchases (Python, Flask)","description":"Created a service recommendation system for after sales services of E-commerce purchases. The random forest model takes customer details as well as the details of the products purchased and recommends appropriate services (Eg. Warranty Services, Antivirus Extensions etc)."}]
